gist: Elena recovers memories for corporate accountant client
conflict: Client fears the truth but needs it
disaster: Recovery succeeds but Elena glimpses her own fragmented memories
outcome: Elena decides to hack her own implant

gist: Marcus visits, they discuss the murder investigation
conflict: Marcus wants to go public, Elena wants more proof
disaster: Elena reveals unnamed guilt she cannot explain
outcome: Marcus leaves worried about her mental state

gist: Elena hacks her own implant for enhanced pattern recognition
conflict: Procedure is dangerous but she needs the upgrade
disaster: Flood of self-incriminating memories - she sees herself murdering
outcome: Elena discovers memory-editing software in her implant

gist: Marcus investigates corporate connections to murders
conflict: Following digital trail while avoiding detection
disaster: Finds evidence pointing to classified witness protection program
outcome: Decides to tell Elena about the program

gist: Elena spirals into paranoia reviewing her recovered memories
conflict: Cannot trust own memories or perceptions
disaster: Realizes Marcus could be implanted construct
outcome: Pushes Marcus away to protect him
